video.title: The F Word: August 27, 2008 (Live from DNC)
video.description: It's no surprise that the American electorate is concerned foremost with dollars and cents. Never before on record has poverty been higher and median income lower for working-age people in the US at the end of a multi-year growth. It's a scam of gargantuan proportions: work hard, enhance productivity and grow the country but don't share in the bounty.
